Name: Clone Tenant
Description: Clone an Octopus [tenant](https://octopus.com/docs/deployment-patterns/multi-tenant-deployments). The project connections and tenant tags will be cloned and the non-sensitive variables can optionally be cloned.

Parameters.Name: CloneTenantStep_ApiKey
Parameters.Label: Octopus API Key
Parameters.HelpText: The Octopus API Key to use for the API requests

Parameters.Name: CloneTenantStep_TenantIdToClone
Parameters.Label: Id of Tenant to Clone
Parameters.HelpText: The Id of the tenant to clone. This will be in the format of *Tenants-1*

Parameters.Name: CloneTenantStep_TenantName
Parameters.Label: New Tenant Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the tenant to create. *Note this must be unique*

Parameters.Name: CloneTenantStep_CloneVariables
Parameters.Label: Clone Variables?
Parameters.HelpText: Flag indicating whether the source tenant's variables should be cloned to the new tenant. *Note this does not copy sensitive variables*
